name: Email validation example
content:
These are all valid email addresses:

foo@demo.net	
bar.ba@test.co.uk

"Abc\@def"@example.com
"Fred Bloggs"@example.com
"Joe\\Blow"@example.com
"Abc@def"@example.com
customer/department=shipping@example.com
\$A12345@example.com
!def!xyz%abc@example.com
_somename@example.com
